ValidationRule.description: this field is required if opportunity stage is verbal commit, contract processing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE, $Profile.Name = "Standard Ads User Profile",
OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PROGRAMMATIC, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PMP ),
ISBLANK( TEXT(eBay_Data_used_in_Targeting__c )),
OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Verbal Commitment'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Contract Processing & Review') ) )
